TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RelationshipKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates the type of the relationship between two or more entities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In this release, this enumeration has only one member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipKind Association = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The relationship is defined by an association in a conceptual model. For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
